column4: can anyone tell me if my wireless card just fried itself out: clicked "Disable Wireless" because I was on an airplane ... now it's gone ... dmesg says "BIOS says wireless lan is blocked ..." .... wtf?!?!
no wlan0 in ifconfig ... no option to "Enable Wireless" in nm-app
do you have a on/off switch for wifi?
well if BIOS is saying something about wireless, what does BIOS show for wireless?
